scoringPlays.text: Mike Dudek 16 Yd pass from Chayce Crouch (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)
Nolan Givan 8 Yd pass from Riley Neal (Morgan Hagee Kick)
Mike Epstein 6 Yd Run (Chase McLaughlin Kick)
Malik Dunner 3 Yd Run (Morgan Hagee Kick)
James Gilbert 3 Yd Run (Morgan Hagee Kick)
Mike Epstein 1 Yd Run (Chayce Crouch Run for Two-Point Conversion)

videos.description: Riley Neal finds TE Nolan Givan for an eight-yard touchdown that puts Ball State up 7-6 on Illinois.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Ball State scores on play-action pass) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ball State scores on play-action pass

videos.description: Freshman RB Mike Epstein rushes up the middle for a six-yard touchdown to put the Illini up 16-7 over Ball State.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Epstein's TD puts Illinois on top) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Epstein's TD puts Illinois on top

videos.description: Chayce Crouch dumps a pass off to WR Malik Turner, who take takes it 25 yards to set up RB Mike Epstein for his second touchdown of the day as Illinois takes a lead 24-21 over Ball State.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Illini take lead off of Epstein's 2nd TD) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Illini take lead off of Epstein's 2nd TD
